name: Windmill (sarochalian (gitganked))
description:
This was made during a one day Game Jam. It was based on a Mad Lib chosen by our Team. 

I love to play Windmill (noun 1).  All the Birds (noun 2) in my Community (noun 3) know how to play.  The rules are simple.  First, you must Tap(verb 1) any time a heart (noun 4) becomes Useful (adj 1).  Some Strong(adj 2) Beer(noun 5) helps out.  But in the end, the one with the most Useful (adj 1) Hearts(noun 4), wins.

Controls - "all of these work :P" - Avea

W/S
Up/Down
Space/Shift
Left/Right Click

Credits

Danny Barboza - Music
Saro Chalian - Audio
Jacob Christ - Art
Avea Krause - Programming
Nathan Ross - Audio
